title: League of Legends Log in Dwn?
body: I cant sign in i was just on Logged off to switch accounts and  i cant log back into either. I get a Unable to connect to the authentication services???

replies.body:
It's likely this was some kind of weird connection routing issue since so many people were affected, but it wasn't a full region-wide problem it doesn't seem. If any of you are still having problems getting signed in, do me a quick favor and try updating your Port Forwarding and DNS settings really quickly using the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a resource if you aren't sure how.

Please let me know in a reply here if you still can't seem to get logged in though!
not just you there is a few others with the same problem me included they are probably  doing patch or sumthing  idk but neither pbe or regular league are working atm
EUW like always LAGGS 1st they killed ping its now they kill server
UPDATE: i SIGNED BACK IN BUT MY FRIEND CAN NOT SO I GUESS ITS BEING PUSHED HARD RIGHT NOW BY PEOPLE TRYING TO GET IN.
Was able to log in. Do try and log in and if it works update your post.
Mine's working now. Someone else please check theirs and confirm. Thanks everyone for upvoting for visibility!
